name: BMST
tag_list: security, audit, ssh, rdp, ica, https, ssl
overview:
BMST Co was founded in March 2006 with focus on innovation and development on network security products and technologies. The founders are veterans at information and network security areas. They are pioneering at cutting-edge audit technologies with Session Auditor series products which can record and replay, audit most of network protocols, including SSH, RDP, ICA, HTTPS, SSL, FTP, SMTP, POP3, SQL, and etc. , even they are encrypted. Further SA could be deployed transparently inline. This also brings great flexibility to users.

So far, the customers of BMST include Fortune 500 banks and telecommunication operators, online game companies, law firms, and etc. This list is in fast growing.
